title: Which of the following best describes the Harle...

content.question: Which of the following best describes the Harlem Renaissance?

choices.label: The rehabilitation of a decaying urban area
An outpouring of Black artistic and literary creativity
The most famous art show of the early twentieth century
The establishment of motion picture palaces

content.answer: An outpouring of Black artistic and literary creativity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
